test_cases.name: Valid Input - Should Process
test_cases.description: Valid listing text that should be processed by AI

payload.listing_text: Beautiful 3-bedroom house for sale at 123 Main Street, Austin, TX 78701. Price: $250,000. 1,500 square feet. 2 bathrooms. Built in 2010. Large lot with backyard. Short-term rentals and Airbnb are permitted in this area.

test_cases.expected_result: Record created in Airtable with AI-extracted data

test_cases.description: Missing listing_text field should route to HUMAN REVIEW

test_cases.name: Invalid Input - Empty String
test_cases.description: Empty listing_text should route to HUMAN REVIEW

test_cases.name: Invalid Input - Whitespace Only
test_cases.description: Whitespace-only listing_text should route to HUMAN REVIEW

test_cases.name: Valid Input - High Price (Should PASS)

test_cases.expected_result: Record created with 游댮 PASS verdict

test_cases.name: Valid Input - Missing Data (Should HUMAN REVIEW)

payload.listing_text: Cozy 2-bedroom condo at 789 Pine Street, Seattle, WA 98101. Contact for pricing. Renovation needed but cost TBD. Rental regulations unclear.

test_cases.expected_result: Record created with 游리 HUMAN REVIEW verdict

test_cases.name: Valid Input - Borderline Case

payload.listing_text: 3-bedroom townhouse at 321 Elm Drive, Denver, CO 80202. $350,000. 1,800 sqft. Needs $50,000 renovation. Airbnb allowed. Built in 2015.

test_cases.expected_result: Record created (total = $400k, should be 游댮 PASS as >= 400k)
